mapper.insert: insert into letsparty_comment(post_no, party_no, user_id, comment_content) values(#{post.no}, #{party.no}, #{user.id}, #{content});
mapper.select: select lc.comment_no as no, p.party_no as "party.no", p.party_name as "party.name", p.party_filename as "party.filename", upa.user_id as "user.id", up.profile_nickname as "profile.nickname", lc.comment_content as content, lc.comment_updated_at as updatedAt, lc.comment_created_at as createdAt from letsparty_comment lc inner join party p on lc.party_no = p.party_no inner join user_party_application upa on lc.party_no = upa.party_no and lc.user_id = upa.user_id inner join user_profile up on upa.profile_no = up.profile_no where lc.comment_no = #{value}

select lc.comment_no as no, p.party_no as "party.no", p.party_name as "party.name", p.party_filename as "party.filename", upa.user_id as "user.id", up.profile_nickname as "profile.nickname", lc.comment_content as content, lc.comment_updated_at as updatedAt, lc.comment_created_at as createdAt from letsparty_comment lc inner join party p on lc.party_no = p.party_no inner join user_party_application upa on lc.party_no = upa.party_no and lc.user_id = upa.user_id inner join user_profile up on upa.profile_no = up.profile_no where lc.post_no = #{value} order by lc.comment_created_at desc limit 2

select lc.comment_no as no, p.party_no as "party.no", p.party_name as "party.name", p.party_filename as "party.filename", upa.user_id as "user.id", up.profile_nickname as "profile.nickname", lc.comment_content as content, lc.comment_updated_at as updatedAt, lc.comment_created_at as createdAt from letsparty_comment lc inner join party p on lc.party_no = p.party_no inner join user_party_application upa on lc.party_no = upa.party_no and lc.user_id = upa.user_id inner join user_profile up on upa.profile_no = up.profile_no where lc.post_no = #{value} order by lc.comment_created_at asc
